backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing menu items, transactions, gift cards, and custom credit cards with CRUD operations and sorting functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing removed QR-card UI features, affected files, and related components for build planning.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files detailing their roles in the POS app and recent QR feature removals.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions establishing the appâ€™s warm color palette and dark mode values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root element and loading the main React script with favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component managing navigation tabs and receipt state across POS, menu, gift card, transactions, and receipt screens.
frontend/src/components/common/ErrorStat: Reusable error display with icon, message, and optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout wrapper providing header, footer, and main content structure with branding.
frontend/src/features/checkout/CheckoutD: Checkout dialog handling fake cash and gift card payments, validation, and transaction completion.
frontend/src/features/checkout/QRCardPay: Empty file placeholder for removed QR credit card payment panel.
frontend/src/features/checkout/Simulated: Simulated credit card input form that validates name, number, expiry, and CVC and reports validity upward.
frontend/src/features/custom-cards/Custo: Empty placeholder file with no implemented UI or logic.
frontend/src/features/custom-cards/QRCod: Empty placeholder file with no implemented UI or logic.
frontend/src/features/giftcards/GiftCard: Allows issuing new gift cards and looking up existing ones with form inputs, mutations, and error handling.
Dialog form for adding or editing a menu item with validation for name, price, and optional category.
frontend/src/features/menu/MenuManagemen: Displays and manages a list of menu items with add, edit, and delete actions backed by menu hooks.
frontend/src/features/pos/POSScreen.tsx: POS interface for adding menu items to a cart, adjusting quantities, and initiating checkout.
frontend/src/features/receipts/ReceiptSc: Displays a printable receipt for a completed transaction with item breakdown and totals.
frontend/src/features/transactions/Trans: Displays a transaction history table with receipt viewing and an empty state message. Pulls transactions from Zustand store and renders summary info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCompleteTransactio: Handles completing a transaction via the backend and stores the resulting transaction locally with a generated receipt ID.
Empty placeholder hook file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useGiftCards.ts: Provides mutations for issuing gift cards, retrieving gift card details, and processing gift card payments using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth provider and hook for managing identity state, login flow, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useMenu.ts: Fetches menu items and provides mutations for adding, editing, and removing menu items via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, utility classes, and print styles for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/state/transactionsStore.ts: Zustand store that persists transactions and provides methods to add and clear them.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling theming, plugins, custom colors, fonts, and layout settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing existing features, requirements, and pending requests for reverting QR-based credit card features.
